I'm a Long time Java developer, nowadays working as a solutions architect with a passion for cloud driven solutions. I keep following the Java community and try to contribute where I can, like providing input to the Eclipse Microprofile project. I also like to visit and share knowledge at conferences to stay informed about what's going on in the community.
